modules.zones
Class ShapeController

java.lang.Object
  modules.zones.ShapeController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GfxPanelNotifiee, ShapeCollection
public class ShapeController
extends java.lang.Object
implements GfxPanelNotifiee, ShapeCollection

Handles all shapes to be displayed on the GfxPanel.

Author:
Creative

          just initialize the PManager instance.

addShape

public void addShape(Shape tmpRect)
adds the given shape to the arraylist of gfx_panel. notice that the arraylist used is the same instance used by gfx_panel, and that's how gfx_panel allows shapes to be added by code.

Parameters:
tmpRect - the shape to be added

linkWithGFXPanel

public void linkWithGFXPanel(GfxPanel gfx_panel)
in the ShapeController , we need to have a reference to the GfxPanel instance (from PManager) PManager calls this method to give the ShapeController the instance of GfxPanel.

Parameters:
gfx_panel - instance of GfxPanel class , instantiated in the Ctrl_DrawZones class
